item.title: [allstar] NEED HELP BADLY MY LIFE DEPENDS ON IT
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Please use code tags...

Also, methods should start with a lowercase letter. Can you edit your post so it’s easier to read please?

If you’re calling the method, remove “int” so it looks like this.

Methods.LevelUp(skill);

Read full topic

item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

[allstar] need help! comment with answer! [alltar]

QuoteModifyRemove
The compiler errors

client.java:2689: error: '.class' expected
        Methods.LevelUp(int skill);
                            ^
client.java:2689: error: ';' expected
        Methods.LevelUp(int skill);
                                 ^
2 errors

i was cleaning my source, and then i added some codes into Methods.java (a new class) the codes were the methods that handle messages and items given when you level up. this is what i added :

what i put in client.java :

    public void levelup() {
   Methods.LevelUp(int skill);
}

what i put in Methods class :

   public void LevelUp(int skill) {
           switch (skill) {
//blocked other shit that goes here
}
}
